drug.name: Petrolatum
drug.description: A colloidal system of semisolid hydrocarbons obtained from petroleum. It is used as an ointment base, topical protectant, and lubricant.
drug.indication: For use as an over the counter skin protectant [FDA Label]. Commonly used to treat diaper rash and chapped lips [FDA Label] [L858].
drug.pharmacodynamics: Displaces water and acts as a barrier against harsh environmental conditions like wind [FDA Label] [L858].
